articles.content: AppleTV+’s The Morning Show isn’t exactly an awful show. It’s a show with one of the best ensembles on TV, but at any given moment it seems to be wasting half that cast. It’s a show with things on it… [+7312 chars]

articles.author: Kelly Faircloth

articles.description: The royal is reportedly 'not his usual blasé self'
